text: Line 6 of the Chengdu Metro () is a rapid transit line in Chengdu. It starts at Wangcong Temple and ends at Lanjiagou. The total length is ，with 56 stations. Line 6's color is brown. The line began construction in 2016, with previous expected completion in July 2020. The line is still anticipated to open in 2020. Line 6 will use high capacity 8-car Type A trains. Line 6 is expected to be longest stretch of subway to be opened at once in China. == Progress == * 2017-03-01, the first tunnel boring machine was launched. 42 TBMs will be used simultaneously for the construction of the line. * 2019-10-07, tunnel construction completed for Line 6 * 2020-05-27, as Phase 3 section of Line 6 finishes track-laying, other Phase 1 and 2 sections officially started testing rolling stock. * 2020-07-01, as the last section of Line 6 between Xihua Avenue station to Dongguang station is powered on, paving to way for dynamic testing. ==Stations== ; {| class="wikitable" ! colspan=2 | Station name ! rowspan=2 | Transfer ! colspan="2" rowspan="2" | Distance ! rowspan=2 | Location |- ! ! |- style = "background:#; height: 2pt" | colspan = "8" | |- | | | |0 | |Pidu |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | (U/C) | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | (U/C) | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | | | |- | | | | |72.9 |Tianfu New Area |- style = "background:#; height: 2pt" | colspan = "8" | |} ==See also== * Chengdu Metro * Chengdu * Urban rail transit in China ==References== Category:Chengdu Metro Category:Transport infrastructure under construction in China
